blurb: The album is both literal and personal and also metaphorical paralleling the effects of an enslaved mentality...

blurb: My 1st and 2nd LPs are requested on wax more than my other solo work. One's overdue for a repressing, the other has never been pressed.

blurb: Substantial's self-produced 5th solo LP is the sonic journey of a "grown-up" with more growing to do over jazz/soul samples and breaks.
